data.text:
Sidekick drones are totally unbalanced (Overpowered : OP)

The drones have recently been massively buffed: these parts now make 100% damage, ALL of the drones, including the Sidekick drones.

With the flying drones I can understand it, which one could shoot down very easily with machine guns. The rocket drones are seen as never before, and the drones of the fighters were hardly seen before, but they are also rare.

But the Sidekick drones have become absolutely OP by this buffoon. With a shot they now make about 40 damage points, the things are small and have the 200 HP. With 4 standard machine guns as you can easily earn them with the machine guns mission you have to let them overheat until a sidekick drone is destroyed, you have to note here that nciht every shot sits. Of course you write "Then go over it!" Which is very easy because they are neither big nor slow, you are also rammed by many players in close combat, often by your own team, or even lying on an opponent because he has hurled you with his frontal ramp. Have fun with your unguided missiles and shoot your guns at the small drones, you have no longer ammunition.

Every 5th player from 6k PS has at least 2 sidekicks, and in the low-animal range, so under 3k PS, you can see sidekicks from time to time, and there you will be shot very quickly because of your few HP. Leviathane with more than 6 sidekick drones are extremely hard to beat, besides, they all concentrate not on the small dung like the small AI vehicles or even the drones, but on the Leviathan which is heavily armed with other weapons. I also saw Leviathane, not only in the gallery, which only drove sidekick drones, each player died immediately. Fairness looks different.

It would be quite enough to either cut the HP of the Sidekick drone to 100 HP or cut the damage back to the previous value. But if this is not the case, you can add a weapon to the game that does not damage your opponent's vehicles, damage them completely, or damage them if they are not directly bombed, a pulse weapon with a 4x range Flamers would fit well here.

The drones do not need any skills, they are simply completely unbalanced and in the crossout forum to the relevant patch (0.7.40), everything is still highly praised, the drones the buffs urgently needed, etc ... and there I wonder if this Spinner will play the game for more than 10 minutes, instead of buying $ 100 to get up from PS 3000 to PS 7000 within 5 minutes and have fun because they do not know how a video game actually works, to play, not to buy through ,
